title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
